name: DSB Media
description: DSB Media is a powerhouse in creator management, building brands and empowering talent across the digital landscape. With a total ecosystem designed for creators, DSB has helped over 1,500 creators earn more than $2.2 million, gain 8.5M+ followers, and achieve 10,000+ streams. Their expertise in talent management, creator networking, and innovative programs makes them the ultimate partner for ambitious creators. We are proud to have DSB as our headline sponsor for the Marvel Creator Cup!

name: [Coming Soon] Production Partner
description: Stay tuned for details about the amazing organization supporting our tournament casting and production!
